Texts.Chs: 在我们的实验室被攻击之时，我怎么样做才能推进猿人物族的发展？若是作为一名荆棘之环的成员，我也会这么想。下次我们喝鸡尾酒的时候荆棘之翼将会收到一堆的抱怨。
Texts.Eng: How am I meant to further the Apex species when our labs get attacked? And by a member of the Ring of Thorns, no less. That Thornwing will get an earful next time we have cocktails.

Texts.Chs: 我叫了我的精锐科学发展部警卫来收拾这烂摊子。莱克斯医生的尸体不见了。究竟是什么样的疯子会去绑架一具尸体！哦，好吧。可能是被叶族人吃掉了。我设法恢复了一些记录，然后雇佣了另一位医生来继续研究。
Texts.Eng: I sent my elite Miniknog guards to clean up the mess. Doctor Lax's body was gone. What kind of lunatic kidnaps a body! Oh well. Probably eaten by Florans. Managed to recover some of the notes and that, so I've hired another doctor to carry on with the research.

Texts.Chs: 另一方面，我的科技发展部间谍能够追踪到那个不断发布NDA保护信息的恼人博客作者。他躲在人类监狱里，或者是别的地方。我猜，我可能会叫荆棘之翼来解决他。
Texts.Eng: On the plus side, my Miniknog spies were able to track down that annoying blogger who kept posting NDA-protected information. He's hiding out in a human prison, of all places. Might place a call to Thornwing to deal with him, I guess.
